message: Let's be reasonable and split the money fairly, with a slight advantage for me since I'm taking on more risk with inflation.
I'll take a bit more since you're losing value each round
I understand time is on your side, Bob, but let's be realistic. This offer still gives you a good deal.
Each round is costing you, I'll take a bit more this time
Okay Bob, you've made your point.  This offer hurts, but it's better than the inflation getting worse.
